column2:
SELECT 
  --employees.first_name,
  -- employees.last_name,
  teams.name AS team_name,
  COUNT(employees_committees.employee_id) AS num_commitee_members
FROM employees INNER JOIN teams
  ON employees.team_id = teams.id
FULL OUTER JOIN employees_committees 
  ON employees.id = employees_committees.employee_id
GROUP BY teams.name
ORDER BY num_commitee_members DESC
